sentences.english: In Guizhou province there exist three types of the Nuo opera in three different regions.
sentences.chinese: 贵州傩文化主要表现在傩戏的演出中。

sentences.english: Willow tree garden, are everywhere, township of the Chinese opera, glory.
sentences.chinese: 烟柳园下，笙歌处处，傩戏之乡，荣耀华夏。

sentences.english: Nuo opera of Guizhou comprises two major categories.
sentences.chinese: 贵州民间傩戏系统，主要是两个系列，三个层次。

sentences.english: As Tong Tong Tui sounds, two villagers begin to perform Nuo Opera.
sentences.chinese: 随着“咚咚推”响起，两位村民开始表演傩戏。

sentences.english: Thus the actual social meaning of Chizhou Nuo Opera is shown.
sentences.chinese: 这才是池州傩戏存在的现实社会意义。

definition: opera for popular in Sichuan and Yunnan
festival entertainment (lion dance, dragon lantern etc)
Hmong or Miao ethnic group of southwest China
Gelao or Klau ethnic group of Guizhou
local Chinese opera, such as Shaoxing opera 越劇|越剧[Yue4 ju4], Sichuan opera 川劇|川剧[Chuan1 ju4], Henan opera 豫劇|豫剧[Yu4 ju4] etc
exorcising God/God who drives away plague and evil spirits
Yao ethnic group of southwest China and southeast Asia
